bug.author: zoenagy235
bug.description:
The attached image generates green boobs. How to prevent this? Does the input file need color adjustment? Can't imagine better pose than this. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63315823/78940503-dc2ba480-7aad-11ea-8863-74d4ccc78040.jpg></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63315823/78940567-f82f4600-7aad-11ea-8542-e09397addd7a.jpg></denchmark-link>
Using latest release, CPU only mode.

comments.comment: Is there somewhere a checklist of input requirements/suggestions to get the best output?
That makes sense, white contains every color. Should I enlarge smaller images to fit 512x512, or it's better to just pad it out and keep original size?
Great idea, I will try out the mixed option! Any suggestion regarding the image content? Like increasing/decreasing saturation/sharpness or other adjustment that improves result?
